objects.description: [MoonWind](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0149) can execute commands via an interactive command shell.(Citation: Palo Alto MoonWind March 2017) [MoonWind](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0149) uses batch scripts for various purposes, including to restart and uninstall itself.(Citation: Palo Alto MoonWind March 2017)
